category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MRMGTCAdapterConnectionCodeAttributeIDs
preference.preference_description: Defines the IDs of the Generic Tool Catalog (GTC) class attributes that hold ISO adapter connection codes for a catalog component. The default values are -150046, -150048, -151011, -151012, -151021, -151022, -151031, -151032, -151041, -151042, -151051 and -151052. Those connection codes will be converted from ISO to DIN, when the ICO is mapped into another class.
